Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is priced at $1200000. We believe this offer presents an exceptional value proposition, considering its market worth of $1500000. We are confident it will not only fulfill your requirements but also contribute significantly to your endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
